1565820689_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsK.body:
> [mg0](#comment_99_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): I don't find incest wrong as long as both parts agree, but I think I heard something about that having chances for un-healthy offsprings or something.
Genetics are passed from parents to child. Bad/weak gene are overpowered by the good/healthy genes, so when two siblings or parent/sibling tango they share more of the same DNA which leads to an increased chance of the bad DNA getting into the offspring.

Think three times before flushing your money down the toilet paying rent. If you buy a house you can turn around and sell it at some point, possibly for more than you spent to buy it. If you rent you have nothing to show for the money you've spent.
Oh, and your landlord that you are paying rent to, is passing the property tax right to you, so don't think you aren't paying it...
